title: T3 Turkey Red Ad Back Walter Johnson SGC55
author: phlflyer1

posts.post_title: T3 Turkey Red Ad Back Walter Johnson SGC55
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is a nice T3 Turkey Red of Walter Johnson with advertisement back graded SGC55.

[URL=http://s1368.photobucket.com/user/phlflyer1/media/T3_Johnson_Graded_Front_zps1gjq87kc.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1368.photobucket.com/albums/ag169/phlflyer1/T3_Johnson_Graded_Front_zps1gjq87kc.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

[URL=http://s1368.photobucket.com/user/phlflyer1/media/T3_Johnson_Graded_Back_zpsj8pwoixd.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1368.photobucket.com/albums/ag169/phlflyer1/T3_Johnson_Graded_Back_zpsj8pwoixd.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

The card was part of an original owner collection that my father and I acquired back in the mid 1970s and has been in my collection ever since.

If interested, please email me at [url]phlflyer1@gmail.com[/url] rather than PM.

Thanks for looking.

Scott
Bump up for reduction in asking price.
One more bump for a final price reduction. Will listen on reasonable offers.

Bumping old listing with a new reduced price. 

Please email at [url]phlflyer1@gmail.com[/url] if interested

Thanks for taking a look
